about.details:
Incorporated in 2006, Mumbai based Artedz Fabs Limited is engaged in trading and manufacturing of cotton yarn dyed fabrics for suiting and shirting. With in-house designing team and expertise in grey fabrics, they receive the orders from Indian and international markets as well. It has a major manufacturing unit installed at Bhiwandi, Maharashtra, with a capacity of 21 Lakhs Sq. metre fabrics per annum.

The popular products of the company are cotton fabric, linen fabric, polyester fabric, nylon fabric and blended fabric. Company follow Just-in-time concept for managing its inventory level and cost which means they manufacture its products on the basis of orders received from the customers.

The company is specialised in manufacturing men's clothing for summer and winter. Artedz is planning to expand the operations in women wear as well. The company sell its products to the traders engaged in the textile industry. They further sell the fabric to the units engaged in the manufacturing of apparels.

Following strengths have contributed to the company's success and will continue to be competitive:

• On-Time Delivery
• Experienced team and promoters
• Unique in-house design
• Long-maintained customer relations

faqs.question: What is the Artedz Fabs IPO?
faqs.answer:
Artedz Fabs IPO is a SME IPO of 2310000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹8.32 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹36 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on March 18, 2019, and closes on March 20, 2019.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Artedz Fabs IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Artedz Fabs IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Artedz Fabs IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Artedz Fabs IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Artedz Fabs IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Artedz Fabs IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Artedz Fabs IPO opens on March 18, 2019 and closes on March 20, 2019.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Artedz Fabs IPO?
faqs.answer: Artedz Fabs IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Artedz Fabs IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Artedz Fabs IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Artedz Fabs IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Artedz Fabs IPO will be done on Tuesday, March 26, 2019, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, March 28, 2019. Check the Artedz Fabs IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Artedz Fabs IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Artedz Fabs IPO listing date is on Friday, March 29, 2019.
